fr.ign.cogit.geoxygene.appli.api

Interface MainFrame

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractMainFrame, FloatingMainFrame, TabbedMainFrame

    public interface MainFrame
    Author:
    JeT The main frame is the main window displaying the entire application user interface. It is associated with the application Base class of all MainFrame subtypes : - FloatingMainFrame: use JInternalFrames to dock ProjectFrames - TabbedMainFrame: use JTabbedPane to dock ProjectFrames
